chapter.title: Add a VMware ESXi Host to SUSE Manager
chapter.para: This chapter guides you through adding an ESXi host to a running &susemgr; server. This will allow your ESXi host and its clients to show up as foreign managed systems located under: SystemsVirtual Systems

sect1.title: Add a ESXi Host to SUSE Manager

step.para: From the &susemgr; &webui; select Systems Virtual Host Managers.
From the upper right corner of the &webui; select Add VMware-based Virtual Host Manager.
From the Add a VMware-based Virtual Host Manager page fill in the fields with your ESXi host data and select Add Virtual Host Manager.
To view your new ESXi host and its clients select Systems Virtual Systems.
